short_summary: The work described in the requirement will provide necessary data to address this gap by measuring 40 different PFAS in 2776 plasma biospecimens from the CARTaGENE biobank.
description: Biomonitoring of Perfluoroalkyl Substances (PFAS) in biobanked plasma samples
